alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Cass; North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:23PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN ITASCA AND NORTHERN CASS COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM CDT... At 323 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Keewatin, to 6 miles north of Cohasset, to 6 miles southeast of Bena, to near Federal Dam, to near Hackensack. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Deer River and Zemple around 330 PM CDT. Hibbing, Grand Rapids and Pokegama Dam around 400 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Buck Lake, Calumet, Pheasant Lake, Ball Club Lake, Bovey, Mud Lake, Ten Mile Lake, Balsam Lake, Six Mile Lake and Tobique. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Cass; North Itasca; South Itasca
